message: I have a very active confore chatroom with a group of friends. We're playing little game with the "stars" and would love to get some extended/fancy stats (i.e. stars/messages ratio). I wanted to put together a quick page using the Convore API but can't find a way to access the number of stars per user in a given group. Is it hidden in there somewhere? Are there plans to add that?
Best way to do that is get a google app engine and have it just keep looping thru the messages to get all the stars of the group only way to do it
I could probably add that to the api
@protocool bad internet connection at my place right now... had to resend the message
(BTW, guys, I absolutely love Convore! Thanks for this!)
Yeah, I saw it in the membership page, that's why I thought there was a better way than go through all messages. (We're at 6k... ;))
@philippebeaudoin the group membership page has some ranking by stars
@philippebeaudoin okay, now the group membership API endpoint should contain a "message_count" and "star_count" for each member
Nice, nice!!! Blown away by how efficients you guys are.
